backend/main.mo: Defines transaction types, balance and stats structures, and initializes maps and access control for managing financial transactions with role-based access.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking frontend files to feature requirements, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React application and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling PIN authentication flow, loading states, logout clearing, and rendering the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/BackupRestore.ts: UI component enabling JSON backup and restore with status alerts, file validation, and collapsible sections.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCards.tsx: Displays balance overview cards and tiles with formatted amounts, loading/error states, and tile click handling.
frontend/src/components/DailyTracking.ts: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/DaywiseTransacti: Component that displays transactions for a selected day, loads user deductions from localStorage, and shows totals and derived rows. Includes date picker, user deduction input, and filtered transaction table.
frontend/src/components/EditTransactionD: Dialog for editing a transaction with fields for type, amount, description, and date, initialized from the provided transaction. Submits updates via useEditTransaction and closes on success.
frontend/src/components/FilterTransactio: Component that filters transactions between two dates, groups them by day, computes totals and deductions, and displays results in a table. Includes dual date pickers and derived-row calculations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying branding and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app title, logout handling, and authenticated actions for data backup, restore, and clearing all transactions. Uses file input for restore and mutation hooks for backup/clear.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTransacti: Component for viewing transactions by month or year with filters for type and search query. Computes derived rows and shows sorted results in a table.
frontend/src/components/OpeningBalancesF: Form to load, create, or update opening balances with date handling and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/PinAuth.tsx: PIN setup and verification UI supporting confirmation, reset, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during profile setup.
Form to add a transaction with type selection, date picking, validation, and success reset.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays, filters, and manages transactions with edit/delete and derived summary rows.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and persisted identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinAuth.ts: React hook handling PIN setup, hashing, verification, session restore, and reset using localStorage and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query wrappers and localStorage helpers for transactions, balances, profiles, deductions, and opening balances with bigint serialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, gradients, animations, and UI overrides for dropdowns and calendar components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page managing tabs, archive month selection, preselected transaction types, and rendering balance, transaction, and filtering components.
frontend/src/utils/derivedTransactions.t: Generates derived transaction rows such as 10% savings and deductions by analyzing local transactions and date ranges.
Utility for determining transaction direction and providing consistent color and icon classes based on incoming or outgoing type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration, extending theme colors, container settings, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to date picker styling, year-wise views, and overview filtering.
